description:
Create a dedicated architectural layer that enforces tenant isolation at the data access level, ensuring all queries automatically filter by tenant context. Include row-level security policies and tenant-scoped connection pooling.

**Rationale:** With features like delegation, permissions, and security classifications, proper multi-tenancy is critical for data security. This architectural pattern prevents accidental data leakage, simplifies security audits, and enables per-tenant performance optimization and scaling.
title: Implement Multi-Tenant Data Isolation Layer
